text: Takym chynom yavlyav soboyu idola worshipers duped yikhnimy idolamy, v obsyazi ubyvayuchykh yikhnikh vlasnykh ditey. Faktychno, yikhni idoly zapodiyuyutʹ velykyy bilʹ na nykh, ta zmishuyutʹ yikhnyu relihiyu dlya nykh. BOH willed, vony by ne zrobyly tse. Vy budete disregard yim ta yikhni vyhotovlennya
